references.reason: This paper introduces the Fear Survey Schedule (FSS-III), one of the self-report measures used in the study to assess specific emotions, providing a crucial tool for measuring emotional responses in both humans and LLMs.
This paper introduces the Beck Depression Inventory-II (BDI-II), another key self-report measure used in the study to evaluate LLMs’ emotional alignment with humans.
This paper introduces the Aggression Questionnaire (AGQ), a crucial self-report measure in this study, used to assess anger in LLMs by measuring various components of aggression.
